headline.main: Gov. Walker on his Way to Kansas.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Rochester American says: Hon. ROBERT J. WALKER, the now Governor of Kansas, passed through this city on his way to the scene of his duties, Saturday afternoon, on the express train. He was accompanied by F. O. PERRIN, Esq., and several other gentlemen who are going to the Territory with him.

byline.original: BY EMMA D. E. N. SOUTHWORTH

docs.lead_paragraph: ACADEMY OF MUSIC.--After JACOPI--chaos. There was no performance last night, and Mr. MOREL LI'S short season is at an end. The following card says why: TO THE PUBLIC. Signer MORELLI, desirous of fulfilling his en gagements to the public, feels himself compelled to lay before them a statement of the circumstanceswhich have prevented him from doing so.

headline.main: THE GRAND DUKE CONSTANTINE IN PARIS.; Vive in Russle!--The Entree of the Russian Prince--Procession to the Taileries--Reception at the Palace--Personnel of the Grand Duke--Programme of Festivities--The French Railroad Frauds--Rothschild on Carpentier--Miscellaneous. Compliments to Senator Sumer in Paris. The Position of France In the War Against China. Mr. Cobden on His Defeat.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two years ago in this same Paris the Cossacks were the worst persecuted of all races. The Anglo mania bloomed and flourished. The "ros-bif" and the "Goddam" disappeared from the stages of the theatres ; we heard no more of British eccentricity, and the "dear allies across the Channel" were the most noble, the most magnanimous, the most charming of all people;
docs.abstract: Letter replying to a Committee at Paris

byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times:

docs.lead_paragraph: Fifty years age, when New-York had not a tenth of its present population, nor a hundredth part of its wealth or means of intellectual recreation, a satirical periodical was published here, which happens to be the only successful undertaking of the kind that has been attempted on this side of the Atlantic.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Daily Times: I read, with much satisfaction, your article in Saturday's TIMES, "Selling Potatoes by Weight." The law for the benefit, of all, especially the poor, ought to be strictly enforced, if it is constitutional. Eggs should be sold by weight.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; POLICE INTELLIGENCE. ANOTHER HOMICIDE.

docs.lead_paragraph: ANOTHER HOMICIDE.--A long-shore laborer named Peter Ward died yesterday at the New York Hospital, from injuries received on Saturday evening on board the schooner William Smith, at Pier No. 5 North River. Ward was at work on board the vessel named, when he got into some dispute with Thos. P. Fisher, the mate.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New York Daily Times: In speaking of Dr. BELLOWS' argument upon Theatres, HENRY WARD REEOUER Says: "There is a middle term left out which no ingenuity can apply, and without which the argument cannot be sayed from ridicule."

headline.main: ONE WEEK LATER FROM EUROPE.; Rajah Brooke's Account of the Outbreak at Borneo. Particular of the British Plan of Campaign. Cotton Drooping---Breadstuff's Active and Higher---Consols 92 5-8. THE UNITED STATES AND CHINA. Loss of an American Ship in the English Channel. INSURRECTIONS AND MASSACRES. ARRIVAL OF THE ASIA. THE CHINA WAR. Opening of the New British Parliament Election of Speaker. THE QUEEN OF SPAIN'S SPEECH TO THE CORTES. Treaty Between Prussia and Switzerland. Hopes of a Reconciliation with Mexico.

docs.lead_paragraph: The British Mail Steamer Asia, from Liverpool, 3 o'clock afternoon of Saturday, May 2, arrived yesterday morning. The Asia arrived out 8:30 P. M., 27th ult. The Asia brings specie to the amount of $214,195. The steamship City of Manchester arrived at Liverpool at 3 o'clock morning of Friday the 1st inst. The United States Mail Steamer Arago arrived at Southampton on the 30th.

headline.main: Coney Island and the Quarantine Commissioners.

docs.lead_paragraph: " We hear that renewed proposals have been made to the Quarantine Commissioners in regard to the jocation of the Quarantine at Coney Island. Our authority for this statement is one of the owners, and it is made with the concurrence of joint owners on the water-front, and to an extent covering all the land and water necessary to the public health sad for com ??ercial purposes."
